title: Install Gentoo Linux (Part 2) to the desktop

media:group.media:title: Install Gentoo Linux (Part 2) to the desktop
media:group.media:description:
In this part 2 installation guide I'll continue with installing Gentoo starting with the Kernel, the bootloader, and the rest of the base system. After this, I install Xorg and the KDE Plasma desktop.  There's still more to cover to install additional software and perform updates etc, so subscribe for more!

Part 1 is here : https://youtu.be/q9_sXkA4Rv8

Support my channel on Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/doriandotslash
